name: SwapDeal
title: Laptop reselling website
description: SwapDeal is based on laptop reselling.
There can be three types of user for this admin. These are: admin, seller and buyer. They have different authorities.
On the homepage, a user can see differnt categories and advertised products.
By clicking any category, user redirects to that particular category based product page where a buyer can book a product by giving necessary information or can report that product to admin.
On the dashboard of buyer, buyer can see the orders he made and can pay for that order by giving card details.
A seller can add his products and see the products in seller's dashboard. Also can advertise or delete any product.
Admin can see all sellers and buyers, and also reported items which he can delete if needed. Admin also can verify any seller.
There is also a blog page where blogs are shown.

name: Visapress
title: Visa and Immigration Consultancy
description: VisaPress website is based on visa and immigration services.
On the services page, many visa and immigration services are displayed to offer to the users.
By clicking any individual service, user can see that service details page where possible details of the service is displayed.
On the service detail page, there are also a review section where a user can see others's reviews of that particular service.
User can also add a review but for that he must be logged in first.
For login, user must have to register once.
After login, user can view my reviews page where reviews of that particular user are only shown.
User can edit a review or delete a review.
Also any logged in user can add a service on add service page.
There is also a blog page where blogs are shown.

name: TeachMe
title: Learning Platform
description: TeachMe website is based on popular programming language courses.
On the courses page, many courses are displayed to offer to the users.
By clicking any individual course, user can see the course details page where possible details of the course is displayed.
On the course detail page, user can download relevant pdf of that course by clicking download icon.
User can get premium access of any course by clicking the get premium access button, but for that user should have to login first.
For login, user must have to register once.
There is also a blog page where blogs are shown and a FAQ page.
